distinct

order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into common_notify (id, biz_key, type, title, content, link_url, read_status, create_user_id, create_user_name, create_time, update_user_id, update_user_name, update_time, is_del, to_user_id, is_push, version ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{bizKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{linkUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{readStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDel,jdbcType=BIT}, #{toUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{isPush,jdbcType=BIT}, #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER} )

biz_key = #{row.bizKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{row.type,jdbcType=TINYINT},

update common_notify
type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT},
biz_key = #{bizKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
link_url = #{linkUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
read_status = #{readStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_user_name = #{createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_user_id = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
update_user_name = #{updateUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=BIT},
to_user_id = #{toUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
is_push = #{isPush,jdbcType=BIT},
version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update common_notify set biz_key = #{bizKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, link_url = #{linkUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, read_status = #{readStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_user_name = #{createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user_id = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_user_name = #{updateUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=BIT}, to_user_id = #{toUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, is_push = #{isPush,jdbcType=BIT}, version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update common_notify
type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
link_url = #{linkUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
read_status = #{readStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_user_name = #{createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_user_id = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
update_user_name = #{updateUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=BIT},
to_user_id = #{toUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
is_push = #{isPush,jdbcType=BIT},
version = version + 1
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}
UPDATE common_notify SET push_status = 1, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND push_status = 0 AND (push_next_retry_time IS NULL OR push_next_retry_time <= NOW())
UPDATE common_notify SET push_status = 2, is_push = 1, push_time = NOW(), update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND push_status = 1

UPDATE common_notify SET push_status = 0, push_retry_count = push_retry_count + 1, push_next_retry_time = #{nextRetryTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, push_error_msg = #{errorMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND push_status = 1
UPDATE common_notify SET push_status = 3, push_error_msg = #{errorMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND push_status = 1
UPDATE common_notify SET push_status = 1, update_time = NOW() WHERE biz_key = #{bizKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND push_status = 0 AND (push_next_retry_time IS NULL OR push_next_retry_time <= NOW())
UPDATE common_notify SET push_status = 2, is_push = 1, push_time = NOW(), update_time = NOW() WHERE biz_key = #{bizKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND push_status = 1

UPDATE common_notify SET push_status = 0, push_retry_count = push_retry_count + 1, push_next_retry_time = #{nextRetryTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, push_error_msg = #{errorMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = NOW() WHERE biz_key = #{bizKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND push_status = 1
UPDATE common_notify SET push_status = 3, push_error_msg = #{errorMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = NOW() WHERE biz_key = #{bizKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND push_status = 1
